location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 574/48 'Roster of employees of Petroleum Concessions Ltd, Bahrain, Petroleum Development (Qatar) Ltd and Petroleum Development (Trucial Coast) Ltd'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 59; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains the Roster of Employees of Petroleum Concessions Limited in Bahrain, Qatar, and the Trucial Coast. The rosters contain information on the position, date of engagement and the nationality of employees at the various locations of the Concession's operations. Most of the rosters cover factory floor and clerical employees with some junior management also named. Some folios include the names of employees at senior management level.
